solution_line_template: During the first half Team, B scored only {team_a_first_half_score} * {half_factor} = <<{team_a_first_half_score}*{half_factor}={team_b_first_half_score}>>{team_b_first_half_score} points.

In the second half Team A scored {team_a_second_half_less_goals} goals less than Team B, so they scored {team_b_second_half_score} - {team_a_second_half_less_goals} = <<{team_b_second_half_score}-{team_a_second_half_less_goals}={team_a_second_half_score}>>{team_a_second_half_score} points.

So in total both teams scored {team_a_first_half_score} + {team_b_first_half_score} + {team_a_second_half_score} + {team_b_second_half_score} = <<{team_a_first_half_score}+{team_b_first_half_score}+{team_a_second_half_score}+{team_b_second_half_score}={total_score}>>{total_score} points.
